Talk_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0a01><snd:Sad_00>My apologies.<sp:5:1:0> It looks like we have a
small problem over here.
Talk_30:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Greeting_00>Yep.<sp:5:0:0> There are<clr:0000> caves at the bottom of
the hill<clr:ffff>.

I used to go mushroom hunting in them
all the time while we were building
the tower.
Talk_25:
<sp:3:0:2:0501><snd:Greeting_00>Say...<sp:5:0:0>since you're inside, can you open
the door?

<sp:3:0:2:0701>Is there anything strange near it?
Talk_03: <sp:3:0:2:0c01><snd:Think_00>The door won't open.<sp:5:0:0> I have no clue why.
Talk_26:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:SurpriseS_01>Wha?!<sp:5:0:0> It opened!


<sp:3:0:2:0101>How in the world did you manage to fix it?
Talk_04:
<sp:3:0:2:0a01>The door isn't locked,<sp:5:0:0> but it won't budge,
no matter how hard I push or pull.

<sp:3:0:2:0801>Ah, of course I know it's a sliding door.<sp:5:1:0>
That's what I meant. Obviously.
Talk_05:
<sp:3:0:2:0301><snd:TalkPositive_01>I heard that the terminal at this Skyview
Tower needed repairs,<sp:5:0:0> so I came to fix
it. But...
Talk_11:
<sp:3:0:2:0a01><snd:Sad_01>My apologies.<sp:5:1:0> The door won't open for
some reason.
Talk_06:
<sp:3:0:2:0a01><snd:Ease_01>*sigh* <sp:5:0:0>I worked up an appetite getting my
brain into gear for this. <sp:5:1:0>I bet the <clr:0000>nearby
caves<clr:ffff> would have some tasty mushrooms.
Talk_13:
<snd:Think_00>The mechanisms aren't working quite
right.<sp:5:0:0> I'll just give them a bit of oil...
Talk_08:
<sp:0:2:2:7d00><sp:3:0:2:0b01><snd:SurpriseL_01>Wha?! <sp:5:0:0>The door opened?!<sp:0:2:2:6400>


Could it be... <sp:5:1:0>Did you fix it for me?!
Talk_14:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:Happy_00>Ta-da!<sp:5:0:0>


It wasn't a big problem,<sp:5:0:0> so a little oil
cleared it right up.

<sp:3:0:2:0101>Right. <sp:5:0:0>I'm going to hurry on ahead, so this
is goodbye!
Talk_09:
<sp:3:0:2:0401><snd:SurpriseS_00>Eh?!<sp:5:0:0> I can't believe a couple of sticks
caused all this hassle.

<sp:3:0:2:0c01>I wonder if those were in there to begin
with and just fell over somehow...<sp:5:0:0>or if
some monster did that on purpose.<sp:5:1:0>
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:LaughS_01>Either way, that really helped!<sp:5:1:0> Thank you.


<sp:3:0:2:0701>Well...
